Plot: Ana bolts from her wedding altar and flies from Venezuela to Paris (in her wedding gown) to realize her dream of becoming a great opera star. The great Parisian director Italo Medici is ...

Writer: Yves Belaubre (dialogue), Telsche Boorman (adaptation), Telsche Boorman (dialogue), Daniel Odier, Chantal Pelletier (dialogue), Corda Prunhuberleon (adaptation), Corda Prunhuberleon (dialogue), Blanca Strepponi, Fina Torres (scenario), Fina Torres (story)
